title: HPI 13 - Grand Illusion - Dharma and Deception in the Mahabharata
itunes:title: HPI 13 - Grand Illusion - Dharma and Deception in the Mahabharata
description: The great Hindu epic Mahābhārata explores moral dilemmas and the permissibilty of lying, against the background of the ethical concept of dharma.
